Description.Text: Cameo Hotel is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of St Petersburg. It boasts a cafe, 24-hour bar and good public transport links. Ligovsky Prospekt is a major street running from just north of Vosstaniya Square to the Moscow Triumphal Gate on Moskovsky Prospekt. Nearby places of interest include Nevsky Prospect, Oktyabrskiy Big Concert Hall and Moskovsky railway station. Zvenigorodskaya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular St. Petersburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a mid-rise building with a pink and blue facade featuring wrought iron faux balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are 10-12sqm and decorated in a simple style with carpeted floors and wood furniture. Some rooms are located in the attic of the hotel. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a fridge and work desk. Some rooms have free Wi-Fi and a faux balcony. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The cafe serves Russian cuisine in a comfortable setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the 24-hour hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Free parking is possible onsite.
